Articles.Content:
The NaNode Project: An expedition to find out all the secrets the universe has to offer.

Why the name NaNode?

Because Nano and Node by which i mean i will create networks called nodes using many things including nano technology.

MODS:

6S Compartment Tubes

Active Texture Management

Aerojet Kerbodyne

AIES Aerospace

Custom Biomes

Custom Configs made for use with MM(Will be available soon)

Deadly Reentry

EnhancedNavBall

Environmental Enhancements

Felbourn's Test Weights(From this thread)

Ferram Aerospace Research

Firespitter

Kerbal Attachment System

Kerbonov Cockpit

KSO

KW Rocketry

Mechjeb 2

Module Manager

Near Future Propulsion

Procedural Parts

Real Chutes

RemoteTech2

SDHI

SimplePartOrganizer

Toolbar

TouhouTorpedo Mk3 Expansion

TouhouTorpedo Mk4 Expansion

Some mods aren't listed because they would come with the downloads of other mods.

I'm currently also working on some MM configs.
